snippet: Russia will have to prove it can be trusted again but there was no appetite among Western allies for a new cold war, British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson said on Monday....

headline.main: The Latest: Belgian Minister: Erdogan's Comments 'Nonsense'
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Belgian Minister: Erdogan's Comments 'Nonsense'

lead_paragraph: Russia will have to prove it can be trusted again but there was no appetite among Western allies for a new cold war, British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson said on Monday.
